validationRule.errorMessage: The length of 3rd Party Comments can only be upto 40 characters only.
The UID of cause is a postive number and can support a number upto 10 digits only.
The Grid ref of cause X should be between 240000 and 550000.
The Grid ref of cause Y should be between 170000 and 440000
The DAS code should be of length 8 only and it should start with a character with this format: Q-123-12
The length of Comments can only be upto 500 characters only.

screens.name: CauseIncidentDetailsScreen5
screens.label: Enter cause of incident details (these are the reasons for the incident)

validationRule.errorMessage: The length of Other can only be upto 500 only.
The UID of cause is a postive number and can support a number upto 10 digits only.
The Grid ref of cause X should be between 240000 and 550000.
The Grid ref of cause Y should be between 170000 and 440000.
The DAS code should be of length 8 only and it should start with a character with this format: Q-123-12
The length of Comments can only be upto 500 characters only.

validationRule.errorMessage: The length of House Name can only be upto 80 characters only.
House Number should be postive.
The length of Street can only be upto 80 characters only.
The length of Town can only be up to 80 characters only.
The length of City can only be up to 80 characters only.
The length of Post Code can only be up to 80 characters only.
The length of Occupier's Name can only be up to 80 characters only.
